PackageOracle.name: DA_MEDIA_STREAM
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_MEDIA_STREAM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.00.038493000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,equip_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,error_ind IN NUMBER
,fast_forward_cnt IN NUMBER
,fast_forward_seconds_qty IN NUMBER
,pause_cnt IN NUMBER
,pause_seconds_qty IN NUMBER
,raw_cnt IN NUMBER
,raw_seconds_qty IN NUMBER
,start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,title_id IN NUMBER
,viewing_seconds_qty IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_media_stream;

body.name: DA_MEDIA_STREAM
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_MEDIA_STREAM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.00.049334000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,equip_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,error_ind IN NUMBER
,fast_forward_cnt IN NUMBER
,fast_forward_seconds_qty IN NUMBER
,pause_cnt IN NUMBER
,pause_seconds_qty IN NUMBER
,raw_cnt IN NUMBER
,raw_seconds_qty IN NUMBER
,start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,title_id IN NUMBER
,viewing_seconds_qty IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_media_stream.add, parms=' || account_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || end_dttm || '|' || equip_mac_address_id || '|' || error_ind || '|' || fast_forward_cnt || '|' || fast_forward_seconds_qty || '|' || pause_cnt || '|' || pause_seconds_qty || '|' || raw_cnt || '|' || raw_seconds_qty || '|' || start_dttm || '|' || title_id || '|' || viewing_seconds_qty || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_media_stream a
(
a.account_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.end_dttm
,a.equip_mac_address_id
,a.error_ind
,a.fast_forward_cnt
,a.fast_forward_seconds_qty
,a.pause_cnt
,a.pause_seconds_qty
,a.raw_cnt
,a.raw_seconds_qty
,a.start_dttm
,a.title_id
,a.viewing_seconds_qty
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.account_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.end_dttm
,add.equip_mac_address_id
,add.error_ind
,add.fast_forward_cnt
,add.fast_forward_seconds_qty
,add.pause_cnt
,add.pause_seconds_qty
,add.raw_cnt
,add.raw_seconds_qty
,add.start_dttm
,add.title_id
,add.viewing_seconds_qty
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_media_stream.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_media_stream.del, parms=' || account_id || '|' || start_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_media_stream a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.account_id = del.account_id
AND a.start_dttm = del.start_dttm
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_media_stream.del');

END del;

END da_media_stream;
